== XSLT
XSLT allows converting XML into other formats. XSLT stands for
Extensible Stylesheet Language for Transformations
. You typically run XLST from the command line but there is also tooling available for graphical tools, like the Eclipse IDE.
For an introduction to XML please see http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/JavaXML/article.html"> Java and XML Tutorial
.
